TITLE: Episode 30 - No Pulse? No Problem. [Adult Language]
DESCRIPTION: This week, I take on a neoconservative's call for re-education camps, the repudiation of the left in the UK, necrophilia, the current state of the Democratic candidates, and Time's Person of the Year, Greta Thunberg.
CONTENT: This week, I take on a neoconservative's call for re-education camps, the repudiation of the left in the UK, necrophilia, the current state of the Democratic candidates, and Time's Person of the Year, Greta Thunberg.
